Author: jorian#4555
Content: they still exist

Author: jorian#4555
Content: REVS pays out a revenue share, but since prices are low, there's not really a reason to do a payout

Author: jorian#4555
Content: same goes for DEX, since BarterDEX volume is quite low

Content: so it isn't collecting a lot of fees, so again no reason to do a payout now

Author: jorian#4555
Content: SUPERNET is a kind of fund, but again since all coins are down, SN is down too

Content: those assets are a long term investment anyways, imo
